--- title: Color keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "To provide unified color scheme for altair and seaborn for my own projects" ---
{% raw %}

Install¶

pip install pcolor

How to use¶

Altair¶

from pcolor.core import setup_altair
setup_altair()

Seaborn¶

from pcolor.core import setup_seaborn
setup_seaborn()
{% endraw %}
